content: Nov 13 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1500 GMT on Monday:
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: MUMBAI/BENGALURU American Tower Corp  has agreed to buy about 20 000 mobile phone masts for 78.5 billion rupees ($1.2 billion) from Indian network operators Idea Cellular  and Vodafone India   who are seeking to merge.
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: American Tower to buy Indian telecoms masts from Idea  Vodafone for $1.2 billion

content: NEW YORK  Oct 31 A hitch in a proposed merger of U.S. wireless carriers Sprint Corp and T-Mobile US has further boosted buoyant shares of cell tower stocks  which could benefit if there is no combined company to cut costs by reducing tower usage.

title: Buy signal blares for cell-tower stocks in 2017

content: MEXICO CITY  July 11 Mexico's Axtel  the telephone unit of conglomerate Alfa  on Tuesday said it had reached a deal to sell towers to a subsidiary of American Tower Corp for $56 million.

content: NEW DELHI American Tower Corp  has committed to invest $2 billion in India  in addition to the 58.57 billion rupees ($879 million) it will spend to acquire a controlling stake in Viom Networks Ltd   the country's telecom minister said on Wednesday.
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: American Tower to invest $2 billion more in India - telecoms minister

content: NEW DELHI  April 6 American Tower Corp  has committed to invest $2 billion in India  in addition to the 58.57 billion rupees ($879 million) it will spend to acquire a controlling stake in Viom Networks Ltd  the country's telecom minister said on Wednesday.
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: American Tower to invest $2 bln more in India-telecoms minister

content: MUMBAI American Tower Corp  has agreed to buy a 51 percent controlling stake in Indian mobile mast operator Viom Networks for 76 billion rupees ($1.17 billion) to expand in the world's second-biggest telecommunications market by number of users.
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: American Tower bulks up in India with $1.2 billion Viom stake buy

content: MUMBAI  Oct 21 American Tower Corp has agreed to buy a 51 percent controlling stake in Indian mobile mast operator Viom Networks for 76 billion rupees ($1.17 billion) to expand in the world's second-biggest telecommunications market by number of users.
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: UPDATE 2-American Tower bulks up in India with $1.2 bln Viom stake buy

content: MUMBAI  Oct 21 American Tower Corp said on Wednesday it has agreed to buy a 51 percent controlling stake in Indian mobile mast operator Viom Networks for 76 billion rupees ($1.17 billion).
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: American Tower to buy controlling stake in India's Viom for $1.2 bln

content: MUMBAI  Oct 21 American Tower Corp is set to buy a majority stake in India's Viom Networks  in a deal that could be announced as early as Wednesday  two sources directly involved in the negotiations said.
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: American Tower set to buy control of India's Viom Networks - sources

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 5 Verizon Communications Inc  will sell wireline assets to Frontier Communications Corp  for $10.54 billion in cash and cell phone towers worth over $5 billion to American Tower Corp  the company said on Thursday.
name: American Tower Corporation (REIT)
title: UPDATE 3-Verizon to sell wireline operations and towers worth over $15 bln
